ai-patthana24.12:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.12:0.3_0: perhaps the Shady Orchid Tree is the cause of predatory animals,
ai-patthana24.12:3.1_0: Not for the sake of defilement or for the sake of defilement, but not for the sake of a single eon. ...
ai-patthana24.12:3.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana24.12:4.1_0: Not for the sake of teaching ...
ai-patthana24.12:5.1_0: Neither have no cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.12:6.1_0: Not for the sake of defilement or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of a single eon, not for the sake of defilement, nor for the sake of a single cause.
ai-patthana24.12:6.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana24.12:6.1_4: This is the section in brief.
